import datetime # import datetime # current_time = datetime.datetime.now() # print("Current time is:", current_time) import smtplib from email.mime.multipart import MIMEMultipart from email.mime.text import MIMEText def send_mail(to='niloy.shown+a1@gmail.com', subject='', body=''): current_time = datetime.datetime.now() body = f"""
This is for test mail form function {current_time}
""" msg = MIMEMultipart() msg['From'] = 'niloy.shown@gmail.com' msg['To'] = to smtp_server = 'smtp.gmail.com' smtp_port = 587 username = 'niloy.shown@gmail.com' password = 'xmkjodlqbzmkhmhb' server = smtplib.SMTP(smtp_server, smtp_port) server.starttls() server.login(username, password) msg['Subject'] = subject msg.attach(MIMEText(body, 'html')) server.sendmail(msg['From'], msg['To'], msg.as_string()) server.quit() current_time = datetime.datetime.now() print("Current time is:", current_time) Current time is: 2023-04-15 02:38:00.570298 body = f"""
This is for test schedule Mail {current_time}
""" print(body) print(body) # current_time = datetime.datetime.now() # print("Current time is:", current_time) # send_mail(to='niloy.shown+a1@gmail.com', # subject="test Mail")
